# The ffi extension

This extension provides Foreign Function Interface (FFI) support to run C code
through PHP.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_FFI

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_FFI_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
